name: 林逾先
objective:
根據圖網理論，本課程介紹學生在物流規劃領域內，幾類有用的網路模式。課程主要含蓋下列三種類型的網路型態: (1) 覆蓋行程距離，包括“最短距離(成本)路線問題”與“交通流量指派問題”； (2) 車輛繞行，包括“中國郵差問題”與“旅行銷售員問題”；(3) 設施位址，包括非緊急與緊急設施地點的選定，即所謂的“中位地點問題”與“中央地點問題”。為使學生能順利完成作業起見，本課程將首先介紹IBM所發展的APL電腦語言給學生。
Based on graph theory, this course introduces the network models useful in the planning of logistic flow from the business management point of view. The course covers three major areas in network flow, namely (1) traveling distance that includes “shortest distance (cost) problem” and “traffic assignment problem”; (2) vehicle routing that includes “Chinese postman problem” and “traveling salesman problem”; (3) facility location that includes the selection of emergency and non-emergency locations known as “median problem” and “center problem”, respectively. To facilitate the workout of the assigned problem by student, this course will first introduce the concise computing language APL developed by IBM.

9  期中考

   Minimum spanning tree and traveling salesman problem

   Single-depot vehicle routing problem 
13 多重調度站車輛繞行問題
   Multiple-depot vehicle routing problem

   Review
18 期末考試
   Final Examination
